verses.content: Lal Lemuel thuhai chu; thuvar a nuin ama a inchûktir chu.
Ieng am, ka naupa? Ieng am, ka sul ra ka naupa? Ieng am, ka thutiemhai naupa?
Nuhmeihai kuoma chun i hrâtna pe naw la, Lalhai sukbohmang hlaktu kuoma chun i lampuihai pe bawk naw rawh.
Aw Lemuel, uoin dâwn hi lalhai ta ding a ni nawh a, lalhai ta ding a ni nawh; Lal naupahai khawm chun, “Zu khâw lai am a um a”? ti ding an ni nawh.
Inrui hlau an ta, dân chu theinghil an ta, Suknawmnata um tukhawm ta dinga rorêlna chu her kâwi hlau an tih.
Bohmang el dinga inzosa zing kuoma chun zu chu pe la, Lungrila rimsi kuoma chun uoin chu pe rawh.
Indâwntir la, a tlâksamna chu theinghil raw se, A pasietna chu hre zing bawk ta naw raw se.
Ṭawngtheilo ta ding chun i bau ka la, Chuong ang po po chungthua chun rausana mâksan an nih.
I bau chu ka la, feltakin ro chu rêl la, Chun, tlasamhai le pasiehai ta ding chun rorêlna rawng chu bâwl rawh.
Nuhmei ringum chu tuin am hmu thei a ta? A hlutna chu lung mantamhai nêkin ân sâng dai sih a.
A pasal lungril chun ama chu a ring a, Hlâwkna tlâksamna hrim hrim nei naw nih.
Amanu chun a dam sûng nihaia po po chun, Ama chu a thaw ṭhah a, a sukṭha naw ngai nawh.
Pat le sahmul dâm chu a zawng a, A kuthai chun thafântakin sin a thaw hlak.
Amanu chu sumdâwng mi lawnghai ang a na, Hlataka inthawkin a bu chu a hung lâk hlak.
Zân a lân thim lai khawmin a tho a, A sûngkuohai ta ding chun bu a pêk hlak a, A siehlawnuhai ta dingin an chanpuol chu a pêk hlak.
Lo chu a ngaituoh a, ân châwk a. A kuthai rasuok chun an grêphrui a phun a.
Hrâtnain a kâwng chu a hrên a, A kuthai chu a sukhrât a.
A sumdâwngna chu a hlâwk a nih ti chu a hmuh a, A khâwnvar chu zâna khawm chun a thi ngai nawh.
A kuthai chu sûthlâmah ân nghat a, A kuthai chun hmuithal chu a chel a.
Mi pasiehai tienga chun a kut chu a phar a; Anih, mi tlasamhai chu a kuthai chu ân tlungtir hlak.
A insûng ta ding chun vûr chu a ṭi nawh a, A insûng sûngkuohai po po chu sen inlâra inthuom an ni sih a.
Ama ta ding chun puon kawp ta ṭiel ṭhungphahai a siem a, A silfên chu puon zai inhmi kawp dumpâwl a nih.
Daikawtkhârhaia chun a pasal chu hriet a na, Ram upahai laia a ṭhung lai khawm chun.
Puon zai inhmi silfênhai a siem a, a zawr a, Dâwrkaihai kuoma chun kâwngkhihai a pêk a.
Hrâtna le inzaumna chu a silfên an na, Hun la hung tlunga ding khawm chun ân nui a.
Varna leh a bau chu a kah a; Lunginsietna inchûktirna chu a leia chun a um a.
A insûng ta dinga lampuihai chu ṭhatakin a en a, Thabona bei hrim hrim chu a fâk ngai nawh.
A nauhai chu an tho a, ama chu vângnei an ta, A pasal khawm chun, ama chu ân pâk a;
“Naunuhmei tamtakhai chun ringumtakin an thaw tah a; Amiruokchu, nang chun an rêngin i khûm vawng a,” tiin.
Ditsakna hi hmusitum a na, mawina khawm hi teplo mei mei a nih, Amiruokchu, nuhmei LALPA ṭitu chu, ama chu inpâkin um a tih.
A kuthai rasuok chu ama chu pe la, Dâikawtkhârhaia chun a sinthawhai chun ama chu inpâk raw se.
